meanings.sent1: The books were stacked compactly on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: She folded the clothes compactly to save space in the suitcase.
meanings.sent3: The puzzle pieces fit together compactly, like a perfect match.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed compactly in the garden, creating a colorful tapestry.
meanings.sent5: The ants moved compactly in a line, efficiently carrying food to their nest.

meanings.definition: In a concise and efficient way
meanings.sent1: He explained the plan compactly, without unnecessary details.
meanings.sent2: The instructions were written compactly on a small card.
meanings.sent3: The comedian delivered his jokes compactly, getting straight to the punchline.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were organized compactly, like a well-structured essay.
meanings.sent5: The robot moved compactly through the factory, completing tasks with precision.
